divs: sighting detailssighting report: at around 9:30 pm on 3\19\2005, i stepped outside my house to get some fresh air. i looked up, and to my surprise i saw a saucer-shaped craft with 4 lights, 2 of which blinked several colors, alternating between blue, purple, green, and red. the other two were white. the lights swirled around the side of the craft. i double checked to make sure it was not a tower of some sort, but at that time the only lights around were the yellow streetlights. another thing that conviced me it was a ufo was the "loooooooooooooooooo" sound it made as it streaked across the sky. definitely not something a man-made craft could have done, and i bet no man-made craft could have been as fast as this. it did not fly in a straight path, but curved, making a figure-eight of sorts. eventually, it faded out of view, and left just as quietly as it came. i hope i was not hallucinating, but it seems my neighbors also spotted the object.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Virginia Gardens
This sighting has never been favorited.
